# sensor

**Type Property**

A collision filter for an entity that collides with everything.

## Declaration

```swift
static let sensor: CollisionFilter
```

## Discussion

The sensor collision filter is typically used by rays in ray casts, shapes in convex shape casts, and trigger volumes. It corresponds to a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionFilter/group] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionFilter/mask] both set to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionGroup/all].

## Creating a collision filter

- **init(group:mask:)**: Creates a collision filter.
- **default**: The default collision filter.
